statements: SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE farm_id = 50;
SELECT booking_id, booking_status FROM bookings WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY booking_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE customer_id = 123 AND farm_id = 456;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_status FROM bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, farm_id, booking_status FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'CONFIRMED' ORDER BY booking_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, booking_status FROM bookings WHERE customer_id IN (789, 987, 654) ORDER BY customer_id ASC, booking_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT booking_id, num_visitors FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE num_visitors > 5 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(num_visitors) AS total_visitors FROM bookings GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_visitors > 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM bookings b LEFT JOIN customers c ON b.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM bookings
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_date, total_guests FROM bookings WHERE total_guests > 10
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_date, total_guests FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, booking_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE total_guests > 10 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND customer_id = 2002 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT booking_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM feedback GROUP BY booking_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 1 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT num_adults, num_children, visit_date FROM bookings WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM farm_visits ORDER BY visit_date ASC
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY visit_date DESC, num_adults ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT b.booking_id, b.visit_date, c.customer_name FROM bookings b JOIN customers c ON b.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT f.feedback_id, f.feedback_text, c.customer_name FROM feedback f JOIN customers c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT * FROM farm_visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT customer_id, date, status FROM bookings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT booking_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_visits WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND time > '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY time ASC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT count(*) FROM farm_visits WHERE farm_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT feedback.rating, feedback.comment, bookings.date FROM feedback JOIN bookings ON feedback.booking_id = bookings.booking_id WHERE feedback.rating >= 4
